item.title: NFL Fantasy Analysis
item.description: library(dplyr) library(readxl) library(ggplot2) Kamara <- read_excel("/Users/acruz/My Files/R Project/Evan Engram/Evan.xlsx" , sheet = 3) ## readxl works best with a newer version of the tibble package. ## You currently have tibble v1.4.2. ## Falling back to column name repair from tibble <= v1.4.2. ## Message displays once per session. ## Warning in strptime(x, format, tz = tz): unknown timezone 'zone/tz/2019b. ## 1.0/zoneinfo/America/Los_Angeles' Mark_Ingram <- read_excel("/Users/acruz/My Files/R Project/Evan Engram/Evan.xlsx", sheet = 4) Kamara <- Kamara %>% filter(attempt>0) %>% select(player, week, points) ## Warning: package 'bindrcpp' was built under R version 3.
